mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shoppingmall.returned_purchase(messageType, manifest, returnUserName, returnUserAddress, returnCommodityName, returnCommoditySku, backstageHandlersint, purchaseHandlersint) VALUES(#{returned.messageType},#{returned.manifest},#{returned.returnUserName},#{returned.returnUserAddress},#{returned.returnCommodityName},#{returned.returnCommoditySku},#{returned.backstageHandlersint},#{returned.purchaseHandlersint})
